definitions.definition: a spoken description of an event on the radio or television that is broadcast as the event happens:
examples: The commentary on the Olympic Games was much better on the other channel.

definitions.definition: a set of written remarks on an event, book, or person that explains its subject or expresses an opinion on it:
examples: There's good arts coverage in the newspaper, but not much political commentary.

definitions.definition: a continuous description of events as they are happening
